item.title: Project: Employee Attrition Predictor and Recommendation System
item.description: Created a tool that calculates the cost of attrition to help companies understand the cost impact associated with attrition. Worked with the IBM Dataset to perform data pre-processing , exploratory data analysis , correlation analysis. Used autoML to find the best machine learning algorithm. Built a recommendation strategy sheet that provides recommendations for top attrition predictors. Created a shiny app and deployed the app through shinnyapps.io. Link to Attrition App
